name: The Realm Game
blurb: An emotive visually stunning game set in a familiar but strange future - an imaginative evolution of the point&click adventure genre

rewards.reward: No Reward

KINDLY SPIRIT - $2 / \u20ac1\r\n==============================\r\nYou receive our undying thanks for making this amazing game a reality as well as receiving 100 karma points for your next incarnation. That and your name on our website hall of fame.
VILLAGER  - $15 / \u20ac12\r\n==============================\r\nYou will get the full game DRM free for PC or Mac, plus your name on our website for prosperity.

ELDER (EARLY BIRD) - $23 / \u20ac18\r\n==============================LIMITED EARLY BIRD PRICE : You will get a unique special edition copy of the game which has been 'digitally signed' with a personalised thank-you signature from the team. You will also get a behind the scenes documentary on the making of the game and a PDF of the design documents.

WITCH DOCTOR \u00a315 - $23 / \u20ac18 ==============================\r\nYou will get a DRM Free copy of the game together with a digital copy of The Realm Handbook - a beautiful illustrated guide, exclusive to Kickstarter backers, that provides a walkthrough of the game together with hints and secrets - so you can enjoy the game to the fullest.

DOUBLE TROUBLE - $26/ \u20ac20 ==============================\r\nYou will get the full game DRM free for PC or Mac, plus your name on our website for prosperity plus an additional copy to give to a fellow gamer or loved one.

ELDER - $31 / \u20ac23\r\n==============================\r\nYou will get a unique special edition copy of the game has been 'digitally signed' with a personalised thank-you signature from the team. You will also get a behind the scenes documentary on the making of the game and a PDF of the design documents.

JOURNEY MAN (EARLY BIRD) - $46 / \u20ac35\r\n==============================LIMITED EARLY BIRD PRICE: In addition to the Special Edition, you will be invited to try a beta-version of the game prior to its release. You will also have access to our special developer forums so you are always up to date on the latest developments and will be credited as a beta-tester in the game.

JOURNEY MAN - $54 / \u20ac41\r\n==============================\r\nIn addition to the Special Edition, you will be invited to try a beta-version of the game prior to its release. You will also have access to our special developer forums so you are always up to date on the latest developments and will be credited as a beta-tester in the game.

**NEW** DIGITAL DELUXE ELDER - $53 / \u20ac41\r\n==============================\r\nThis is the ultimate digital suite. Including The Realm: Special Edition with Documentary and Design Document PDF plus the Digital Soundtrack and an Artbook PDF.

DIGITAL DELUXE JOURNEY MAN ($68)\r\n==============================\r\nThis is the ultimate digital suite. Including The Realm: Special Edition with Documentary and Design Document PDF plus the Digital Soundtrack, the Handbook and an Artbook PDF. In addition you will be invited to try a beta-version of the game prior to its release. You will also have access to our special developer forums so you are always up to date on the latest developments and will be credited as a beta-tester in the game.

ARTISAN - $77 / \u20ac59\r\n==============================\r\nWe have a limited number of signed Art of Atomhawk books available to give away. This has become a 'must have' book for artists and fans of fantasy art. Plus all the rewards in the Journey Man tier.

BOLD TRAVELLER - $77 / \u20ac59\r\n==============================\r\nYou will get a quality stylish t-shirt so you can tell the world you're a Realm backer! Also you will get the digital soundtrack of the game when it becomes available. Plus all rewards in the Journey Man tier (see matrix).

**NEW** PHYSICAL DELUXE ELDER - $77 / \u20ac59\r\n==============================\r\nFor the collectors out there. Includes a boxed version of The Realm : Special Edition including the documentary and design document on the disc. A printed colour booklet and a selection of A5 printed art cards. You'll also get the Digital Soundtrack as a download.

CONNOISSEUR - $122 / \u20ac94\r\n==============================\r\nWhat better way to enjoy our lovely art than to have it adorning your wall? Yes, you will receive an attractive A2 sized colour poster of our title image to enjoy plus all rewards in the Bold Traveller tier (see matrix)

SENIOR BARD - $153 / \u20ac117\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a Collectors Edition of The Realm's amazing soundtrack by Richard Jacques, multi award-winning composer, with exclusive new tunes not found in the game or digital edition on a lovely digipack CD. Plus all rewards in the Connoisseur pack (see matrix)

SENIOR ARTISAN - $230 / \u20ac176\r\n==============================\r\nAtomhawk Design will be making an exclusive 3.5 hour training video of their Art Masterclass so you can see for yourself all the tricks of the trade if you are unable to attend or afford the Legendary Artisan tier yourself. Plus all rewards in the Senior Bard pack (see matrix)

MASTER ARTISAN - $291 / \u20ac222\r\n==============================\r\nYou will get a collection of the stunning art and sketches from The Realm in a beautifully presented signed limited edition book so you can watch the evolution of the artwork. Plus all rewards in the Senior Artisan pack (see matrix)

HERO - $459 / \u20ac351\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a very special limited edition collectable figurine of the characters in the game, hand painted and made in excellent materials. Plus all rewards in the Master Artisan pack (see matrix)

LORD NOBLE - $765 / \u20ac585\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a special code you can enter in the game, just for you, that unlocks a secret personalised easter egg that you can brag to all your friends about and attract potential mates with. Plus all rewards in Hero pack (see matrix)

HIGH LORD NOBLE - $1148 / \u20ac878\r\n==============================\r\nYou will receive a very limited edition (max run of 50) numbered print, signed and framed. Similar prints fetched hundreds of pounds in recent exhibitions. Plus all rewards in Lord Noble pack (see matrix)

INNER CIRCLE - $1530 / \u20ac1170\r\n==============================\r\nYou will be invited to a monthly video stream conference with the team where you can ask questions and directly influence the design of the game. Basically you become part of the team and credited as such in the game. Plus all rewards in High Lord Noble pack (see matrix)

LEGENDARY ARTISAN - $2754 / \u20ac2106\r\n==============================\r\nYou will be invited to a special Masterclass that Atomhawk will be holding at their offices in Newcastle. Here you can talk to and be trained in the skills of a master artist with one-on-one tips. Travel not included. Plus all rewards in Inner Circle pack (see matrix)

LEGENDARY BARD - $2754 / €2106
==============================
You will be invited to Richard Jacques’s central
London studio for a masterclass on writing music for video games, TV and film, and learn from a pro at the top of his game. Should we reach our stretch goal and have the score recorded with a live orchestra, you will also be invited to the recording session. Travel not included. Plus all rewards in Inner Circle pack (see matrix)

IMMORTAL - $3825 / \u20ac2925\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have your appearance immortalised in the game - it may be a statue, in a painting or reference in an ancient scroll. We will work with you to find a suitable dedication that becomes your stature! Plus all rewards in Inner Circle pack and either Legendary Artisan or Legendary Bard reward (see matrix)

DEMI-GOD - $5355 / \u20ac4095\r\n==============================\r\nYou will have a one-off signed portrait made of you by one of our lead artists in the style of The Realm - no one else will have this. Plus all rewards in Immortal pack (see matrix)

DEITY - $7650 / \u20ac5850 ============================== \r\nYou will be transported from within the UK to Newcastle for a tour of the office, get to meet the team, chat about the game and also a special dinner held in your honour. Plus all rewards in Demi-God pack (see matrix).
